name: Geometrix 3 Cosmic Explosion
description:
Cubix an inhabitant of a distant planet is involved in a war against mutant beings the planet Animaliax , Cubix must use all his power to defend his planet Geometrix and end this devastating war.

More information.

The game is the genus platforms and runs on Windows PCs.

Operation is intuitive but You'll have help understanding how to play it.

It has a very interesting story which really progress as the outcome of the story.

The minimum requirements for the PC.

Operating system. Windows XP or higher;

Ram 512.

128mb video graphics card.

Minimum Processor: 1.8.

We are indie creators and we have worked hard for this project.

Your purchase motivates us to keep going.

Thank you ...
